android.support.v7.internal.view.menu

Class ExpandedMenuView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ListView
      • android.support.v7.internal.view.menu.ExpandedMenuView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MenuBuilder.ItemInvoker, MenuView

    public final class ExpandedMenuView
extends ListView
implements MenuBuilder.ItemInvoker, MenuView
    The expanded menu view is a list-like menu with all of the available menu items. It is opened by the user clicking no the 'More' button on the icon menu view.
